game.name: Reel Horror
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A haunted projectionist’s room. A shelf of cursed films. Each reel plays a terrifying short story you must live through. Explore twisted worlds from the safety of the projection booth, or so you think...
game.shortDescriptionEn: A haunted projectionist’s room. A shelf of cursed films. Each reel plays a terrifying short story you must live through. Explore twisted worlds from the safety of the projection booth, or so you think...
